General.Name: Shanghai Lingyun Industries Development Co Ltd
General.GicIndustry: Independent Power and Renewable Electricity Producers
General.Description: Shanghai Lingyun Industries Development Co., Ltd constructs and operates photovoltaic power generation projects in China. It operates a 100 megawatts photovoltaic power station in Baiyin. Shanghai Lingyun Industries Development Co., Ltd was founded in 1998 and is headquartered in Shanghai, China.
